title: Help me i can't run LoL anymore
body:
Hello everyone ,can you please help me , my pc can't handle LoL anymore even on the lowest settings 
Here are my specs :
processor : AMD QC -4000 1.30GHz
Windows version : windows 10
4 GB ram , 3,45GB used
my pc is 64 bit

I get on average only 3 fps , i've tried razor cortex and haste , nothing worked

replies.body:
I took a look over your specs and compared them to the minimum specs for League to run, and it looks like you're just a bit under the minimum processor requirements. As it is now, League needs a minimum of 2GHz processor to be able to run properly and the specs you gave me say you're running a 1.3GHz. 

You can always check our [Minimum and Recommended Specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) to see how your rig compares to what is needed.
ok, i'll try to get a better processor , ty for the help
This is also happening to me too. Does anyone think that this has something to do with the new update?
